examples: She could not recall the time of the incident .
It was an incident that he hoped to forget.
The suspect was released without further incident .

definitions.definition: A (relatively minor) event that is incidental to, or related to others.
An event that causes or may cause an interruption or a crisis , such as a workplace illness or a software error .
An aircraft incident, usually a plane crash.

main_definition: ( countable , uncountable ) An event or occurrence .
secondary_definitions: A (relatively minor) event that is incidental to, or related to others.
An event that causes or may cause an interruption or a crisis , such as a workplace illness or a software error .
( often used in apposition ) An aircraft incident, usually a plane crash.
